trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access a delegate across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 구성 요소는 응용 프로그램 도메인 및 프로세스 경계 대리자에 액세스 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 계약을 정의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To invoke a delegate, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 호출 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to an event or remove a delegate from an event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that is returned by <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 를 이벤트에 대리자를 추가 하거나 이벤트에서 대리자를 제거 하려면 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A>나 <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> 에서 반환 하는</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> 메서드</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> 를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pass an IRemoteDelegateContract that represents the delegate to the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 나타내는 IRemoteDelegateContract 전달는 `parameters` <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> 의 매개 변수

trans-unit.source: Invokes the delegate that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract"></xref> identifies.
An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the delegate parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> </xref> 대리자 매개 변수를 지정 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the return value of the invoked delegate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> 호출된 된 대리자의 반환 값을 지정 하는 합니다.
